Name: Global Game Jam

Name: Ludum Dare
Description: Ludum Dare is an online event where games are made from scratch in a weekend. Occurs three times a year

Name: Game Maker's Toolkit Jam
Description: The most popular annual game jam hosted on itch.io

Name: Itch.io Game Jams
Description: itch.io is a place for hosting and participating in game jams online. Anyone can instantly create and host a jam.

Name: Game Jolt Jams
Description: So easy to use that you might have just started a jam without realizing it.

Name: Epic Jams
Description: Trade Shows, Livestreams, Dev Tours, Workshops, and Other Official Unreal Engine Events.

Name: Game Maker Community Jam
Description: The home of the GameMaker Community's very own regularly occurring Game Jam! Find out more here.

Name: Indie Game Jams
Description: The most complete game jam calendar on the web.

Name: Train Jam
Description: Game Jam that takes place on a train ride from Chicago to San Francisco, arriving for the start of the Game Developers Conference

Name: GameDev.net Challenges
Description: GameDev.net is your resource for game development with forums, tutorials, blogs, projects, portfolios, news, and more.
